subtitles:
43263 46583 People once believed
that when someone dies...

46583 49703 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

50523 53473 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

53903 57703 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

59223 61663 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

62223 66303 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

119023 122903 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

123423 126383 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

130983 133653 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

133903 136143 All right, guys,
let's do it.

136143 139143 Devil's fuckin' Night.
What's the count so far?

140663 143423 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

143423 146663 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

150943 154223 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

154223 157943 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first

158903 161143 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

161143 163983 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

163983 166833 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

167083 169733 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

169983 172903 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
172903 175463 - All right, clear out.

176063 178303 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

180703 183623 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

185123 187273 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

187523 191523 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

200343 202263 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

203223 206143 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

207143 210263 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
210343 212343 She's my friend.
212663 214263 Her and Eric.
216463 218623 You lied to her about Eric.

220623 223183 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

223903 226103 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

235983 239023 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
241863 243743 She's gonna be fine.

261863 265493 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

265743 268623 I used to think that was true
about everything...
268623 272023 families, friends, feelings.

272903 276493 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

276743 280923 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

317583 320223 What are you,
like the night watchman?

341143 343813 You know, what this place
needs is a...
344063 346533 good natural catastrophe.

346783 350813 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

351063 353983 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
353983 356263 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
356263 358263 Hey, hey, let me do it.

359303 362933 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

363183 365623 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

365623 367543 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
367543 369223 Hey, all right.
369863 371663 Now we're talkin'.
372303 375353 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

376863 380343 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

380583 384173 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

384423 386223 - You buyin'?
- I'm buyin'.

386223 389513 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
389863 392823 They make you fart big time.

399023 401703 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

401703 404423 from all the crap
floating around in it.
405383 408263 I wish I could have seen that.
466783 469263 Fire it up! Yeah!

508623 512133 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

534343 537713 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

544583 547183 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

552863 554783 - Damn it!
- What was that?

554783 557343 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
557383 560463 Mickey, call it in for me!

650623 653703 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

653963 657213 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
658063 660063 Place looks fine to me.
660263 662023 Let's redecorate.
665923 668773 "Abash, the devil stood...
669023 671383 and felt how awful goodness is.

672063 676673 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
689063 690983 No, no, no, me first.

737543 740343 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

744063 747063 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

747583 749783 Look at that.
Look at that.

750743 754373 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

758463 760503 You go over there
and talk to your pals--
761403 763713 You sick fuck.

763503 767083 Are you out of
your motherfuckin' mind, man?
772543 774143 Look at that!
775903 777943 Pussies drink last, man.

779063 781713 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.
783303 785543 Shit ain't even loaded, man.
785863 787423 This one is.

787943 790573 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...
790823 793183 wants to bet me this one isn't?

795063 798613 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

798863 801663 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
801903 804403 Fire it up! Fire it up!
805663 807413 Here's your shooters.

807663 809703 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doin'?

843503 846693 - I love you.
- Say that again.
852303 854383 Restaurant.

860063 863263 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

869903 872583 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

966503 968823 Couple more rings.
That's 24k.

968983 972613 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
972863 974863 Leather purse. Leather.
975783 979333 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?
979583 981863 A blood stain that's on here?

984063 986663 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

986663 988983 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
989723 991563 Right there for ya.
993443 995363 Decisions, decisions.
997823 1000943 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1000943 1003693 ...child molestin',
saprophyte motherfucker.

1003943 1005513 Close the gate
when you go out!

1005763 1008653 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1012083 1014883 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1019183 1021623 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.

1123743 1126983 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1130903 1133453 Halloween ain't till manana.
1174023 1176713 Fuck, you murderer!

1177343 1179943 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1179943 1183783 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1183943 1186623 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1187343 1189823 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1189823 1194333 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1194583 1198943 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1199383 1201783 Her name was Shelly.

1201783 1203983 You cut her.
You raped her.

1204783 1209703 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1219183 1223733 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1223983 1228403 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1232903 1235813 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1236663 1238303 We never miss.

1248403 1250323 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1256183 1259723 Victims.
Aren't we all?

1283383 1287713 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- It's a mess.

1294623 1297343 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1301783 1304063 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1306023 1308423 Give me some of that
over there!

1310063 1313163 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1313663 1318093 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1318343 1321773 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1322023 1326393 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1326643 1329453 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1358823 1361183 You're thinking
about the past.
1364703 1366463 Dad gave me this.
1367183 1368863 Fifth birthday.

1371263 1375213 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1388663 1390453 Is she asleep?
1397343 1399263 I think we broke her.
1404343 1406063 I love her eyes.
1447763 1450173 I told you to stay out of here.

1450423 1454023 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1454023 1457733 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1457983 1459983 I don't have any dolls.
1462303 1464143 Get some food, huh?

1463583 1466543 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1471863 1475703 "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
1485023 1486983 Thirty, forty dollars.
1489823 1491903 Who the fuck is this now?

1492263 1496013 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1498943 1502943 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1509903 1513433 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1521343 1525333 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1525583 1528853 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1531223 1533383 What are you talking about?
1533543 1535743 You heard me rapping, right?

1536183 1539913 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1542463 1545383 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1546823 1549783 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1553143 1555263 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1558103 1560143 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1568663 1570863 You're not paying attention.

1576783 1580973 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1582463 1586263 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1588683 1591893 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1596943 1598983 Who's this sack of shit?

1598983 1601863 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1601863 1604663 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1604863 1607623 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1607623 1611623 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1611703 1616013 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1616263 1618183 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1618183 1621873 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1622983 1625343 What the hell
do you call that?
1627303 1629463 I call it blood, detective.

1628863 1632223 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1632583 1635263 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1642663 1643753 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1644003 1646853 - Don't you know this game?
- What game are you talkin' about?

1647103 1649983 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1649983 1653263 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1654263 1659803 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1663023 1665623 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1681663 1685043 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1708583 1711463 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1711463 1713743 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1715603 1717693 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1717943 1719393 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1719643 1721963 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1722263 1726343 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1727223 1730273 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1730923 1733363 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1733903 1736583 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1736583 1739383 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1740783 1743413 Each one of these is a life...
1744103 1746223 a life you helped destroy.

1746943 1749303 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1750143 1752143 I'm not gonna kill you.

1752743 1756823 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1765063 1768183 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1770863 1774223 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1774823 1778133 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1778383 1780463 Is that gasoline I smell?

1801823 1804543 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1805223 1806863 One root beer.
1809343 1811783 I can't do anything.

1811983 1815653 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1822823 1826663 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1827623 1830543 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1830543 1834383 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.

1834883 1838713 And I say I'm dead
and I move.

1839723 1842453 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1842703 1846693 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1846943 1849623 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1851943 1854573 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1854923 1858493 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1858743 1861143 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1861383 1865453 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Come on! Move it!

1867903 1870593 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1870843 1874693 - It's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1874943 1877303 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1877303 1881533 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1881783 1884383 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.
1884383 1887463 He was already dead.

1887823 1891823 He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1893123 1896283 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1896923 1898803 Get away from there!

1898983 1900943 Cops!
Get outta here!

1902063 1905103 Leave it, leave it!
Run!
1910463 1913143 Oh, great, great.

1914703 1917223 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1917223 1919543 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1919543 1924853 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.
1925263 1927623 Little early for Devil's Night.
1930503 1932463 You are very restless.

1933223 1936343 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1936383 1940023 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1951463 1954183 There are energies
aligning against you.
1954383 1956703 Seeing is believing, isn't it?

1975183 1978423 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1979023 1981433 Nobody cleared this
little event with me.

1981683 1982933 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.
1983583 1985733 You must be awfully disappointed.

1985983 1989143 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1989863 1992103 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1992103 1996103 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1996583 1999063 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

1999063 2002463 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2004703 2007263 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2007263 2009863 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2010023 2012023 That's very reassuring.

2012783 2015703 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2016663 2020563 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2021023 2023263 Call it my need to know.
2055023 2056823 Let go, you creep!

2062463 2065183 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2066983 2069063 He couldn't have stopped.

2069343 2072063 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2073543 2076583 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2080423 2084543 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2086143 2088743 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2105743 2109933 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2110183 2113673 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2114423 2116733 Annie...
Look at that.

2117823 2122293 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"
2122543 2124033 What is this, a petition?

2123983 2126533 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2126783 2130743 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2130743 2135013 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2136503 2139983 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2139983 2143873 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2150943 2154103 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2156303 2160343 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2161543 2163133 Ah, I owe you one!

2191903 2195373 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2195623 2198983 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2223063 2225663 There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
2231863 2233583 Come here, bird.

2234463 2236423 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2236583 2238343 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2238823 2240743 Here, birdie, birdie.

2241023 2243503 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2246383 2248263 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2254303 2255943 What the fuck?

2262303 2266063 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2268863 2270983 Don't sweat it.

2273263 2276543 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2284303 2287973 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2290563 2295513 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2295763 2297923 You need professional help.

2302743 2304663 He shoots!
He scores!

2314983 2319073 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2319323 2321553 Stop me if you heard this one.

2321803 2324203 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2329343 2332313 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2332563 2335423 Don't you ever fuckin' die?
2335543 2337743 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2342943 2346263 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?
2349503 2353323 Look what you've done to my sheets.
2376663 2378903 I've got a gun in my pocket.

2381463 2383983 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2401103 2404133 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2416063 2419823 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.
2420423 2423263 Do you understand?
2422703 2425103 Morphine is bad for you.

2436183 2439623 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2470383 2472063 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2472043 2473723 Now fill it up!
2475883 2478203 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2478223 2480063 I really need this.

2490763 2493143 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2493103 2495663 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2495463 2497823 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2497943 2500703 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2500823 2503383 Get my friend here a glass of blood.
2505463 2508213 Hey, good night, Darla.
2512023 2514823 You stay put right there.
2523303 2525983 Get away, steamhead.

2556503 2560663 As you can see, I'm on the corner
of 27th and Washington...

2562103 2564743 the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2564743 2567703 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2567703 2570583 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2570583 2572583 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2572703 2574863 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2574863 2578943 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2582383 2584703 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2590243 2591883 Good likeness.

2591743 2595043 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2595343 2597953 You still have your hat on.
2601263 2603023 I gotta sit down.
2612743 2616693 are you some kind of... ghost?

2626063 2629823 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2632343 2635343 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2636343 2639093 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2639343 2643613 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2643863 2645863 Come on. Read the file.

2646463 2650493 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2650743 2653143 Her body finally just gave it up.

2653863 2656463 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2667063 2668983 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!
2681063 2683303 I saw her through your eyes.
2684343 2686383 You stayed with her the whole time.

2686383 2690353 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2691703 2695683 I was hoping she'd come
out of it, you know.
2696303 2698863 Give me something I could work with.
2703823 2706263 Why didn't you do something about it?

2706263 2709543 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...
2709543 2712183 would talk after what happened to you?
2712903 2715223 I kept asking questions and...

2716063 2719703 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2722463 2724143 This your wife?

2724423 2728513 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2733423 2736343 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2737303 2740103 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2740343 2742703 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2752903 2755983 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2762163 2764883 You going to vanish
into thin air again?
2768183 2770663 I thought I'd use your front door.

2773743 2779223 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2789943 2793143 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2793383 2796183 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2796503 2799423 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2799463 2802223 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2802663 2805023 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2805143 2809343 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2809423 2812823 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2814383 2816823 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2816823 2819263 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2819263 2823193 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2824663 2826783 You ain't lost everything.

2827383 2831643 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2832343 2834333 Fair enough.

2839183 2841623 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2841623 2843583 What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

2843583 2846863 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2847183 2850703 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2851023 2854383 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2857703 2862693 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2862843 2866043 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister?

2865943 2868463 My father's daughter.
That's right.

2869223 2872303 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2872343 2874583 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2874583 2877223 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2878023 2881143 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2881423 2884623 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
2884743 2886983 Whatever the fuck that means.

2887323 2890583 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.
2891623 2893743 Want to relax that thing now?

2893743 2896983 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2898263 2902293 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2902543 2904703 I ain't makin' all this up.
2905183 2907953 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.

2917743 2921963 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2932343 2935463 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2944143 2946463 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2949023 2951783 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.
2953003 2956093 I'll have the janitor come on up.
3019023 3020863 You lost or hungry?
3026263 3028183 " It can't rain all the time "
3028183 3030903 " Can't rain all the time "

3041223 3043863 I don't know how many times
I gotta tell you. We're in this together!
